metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16844 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the loadbuf function in formisc.c in formail in procmail 3.22 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted e-mail message because of a hardcoded realloc size, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-3618.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

procmail - 3.22-25ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: procmail package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22-25ubuntu0.16.04.1').
